name: Climb up!
description:
## About the Game
In "Climb up!" your goal is to survive in the air as long as possible. Platforms and power-ups can help you with this.But watch out for skulls, moving platforms and much more!
## How to play
For Instructions start the Game and click on the "i" Button. 
##   Info
This is my first Game i made in Construct 3 and also my first Game jam. I hope you like it!
I created the Game in 2 Days as part of the ScoreSpace jam #9 which was based on the theme Climbing.
## Device Info
The Game is intended for mobile phones, but is playable here in the Browser for Computer Gamers!
